{"id":979896480,"question_id":2850,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"11 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1687770450,"status":14,"status_display":"Time Limit Exceeded","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/979896480/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Construct the Longest New String","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\n    \n    \n    int max = 0;\n    \n    public int longestString(int x, int y, int z) {\n        \n        // x =AA, y=BB, z=AB, not allow AAA, BBB,\n        // find max len\n        \n        // xx, xz, yy, zy, not allow\n        \n        helper(x,y,z,-1, \"\");\n        \n        \n        return max;\n    }\n    \n    private void helper(int x, int y, int z, int prev, String curr){\n        \n        if(x==0 && y==0 && z==0){\n            max = Math.max(max, curr.length());\n            \n            // System.out.println(1+ \" \" + curr);\n            return;\n        }\n        \n        if(prev==0 && y==0){\n            max = Math.max(max, curr.length());\n            // System.out.println(2+ \" \" + curr);\n            return;\n        }\n        \n        if(prev==1 && x==0 && z==0){\n            max = Math.max(max, curr.length());\n            // System.out.println(3+ \" \" + curr);\n            return;\n        }\n        \n        if(prev==2 && x==0 && z==0){\n            max = Math.max(max, curr.length());\n            // System.out.println(4+ \" \" + curr);\n            return;\n        }\n        \n        if(x>0 && prev!=0)\n            helper(x-1, y, z, 0, curr+\"AA\");\n        \n        if(y>0 && prev!=1 && prev!=2)\n            helper(x, y-1, z, 1, curr+\"BB\");\n        \n        if(z>0 && prev!=0)\n            helper(x, y, z-1, 2, curr+\"AB\");\n            \n        \n        \n        \n        \n    }\n    \n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"construct-the-longest-new-string","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
